ComicInfo.Series: Pieces for Mom: A Tale of the Undead
ComicInfo.Summary: The world has been overrun, the fleash-eating undead rule the streets, and two teen boys are left abandoned in the city to fend for themselves and care for their rotting mother. In a world where the undead eat human flesh, what chance to two boys have when they can hardly get along themselves? Featuring art by Andrew Ritchie that will literally make your skin crawl, and story by Steve Niles, readers will discover that this is NOT your typical zombie story.
ComicInfo.Title: A Tale of the Undead
